name: hunternote

scripts.build:wasm: cd wasm-tools && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir ../docs/.vitepress/wasm && cp ../docs/.vitepress/wasm/wasm_tools_bg.wasm ../docs/public/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:wasm && npm run build

author: starneko (牛奶猫)
